body:
Using Powershell.SDK RC

How can I instantiate a Powershell Object at a defined directory?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Use `Set-Location` after creating the PowerShell object.  There's no members to pre-set the working directory.

title: Powershell.SDK define Start directory of Powershell.Create()
